ygData.subject: Re: Shark attack/Ragnar/Katya
ygData.msgSnippet: Fury is hit and loses his gun.  Improvising, he strikes at Ragnar s already-wounded leg with his lashknife, trying to gimp it.  Riekan drops from the sky

Fury is hit and loses his gun.  Improvising, he strikes at Ragnar's 
already-wounded leg with his lashknife, trying to gimp it.  Riekan 
drops from the sky shoulder-first like a meteor at the mechwarrior.

Pumpskin waits until the last possible second before he brings his 
foot up to intercept Katya's charge, kicking her hard in the head.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I did miss an S somewhere... oh well... they're both dug in 
his 
> flank.
> 
> Bic:
> 
> Ragnar didn't see the attacks until he was hit. The knife slashed 
his 
> hand's back and drops of blood fell to the ground. The cyberwenom 
shot 
> hit hard though. He countered with his two lasers which were now at 
> point blank. Then he started feeling dizzy.
> 
> Ragnar: Ragnar to any friendly, I have been hit bad. Need backup 
fast!
> 
> Katya's attack being useless, she started running at about 100 mph 
at 
> Pumpskin. She planned on tackling him.
> 
> Blackfang felt the pain of the blade slashing his abdomen. Then the 
> lasers hit him. He flew backward a dozen meters and took a moment 
> before standing up.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Riekan's got TWO blades.  Can't you read?
> > 
> > The Gauss slug tags Riekan in the hip, and he takes to the air to 
> > compensate for the loss of mobility on the ground.  Then Fury 
> > attacks, slinging his lashknife in one hand and firing his 
> cybervenom 
> > gun in the other.  The reasoning being, Ragnar couldn't very well 
> > dodge two simultaneous attacks if he couldn't see them coming 
until 
> > the last second.
> > 
> > Pumpskin shortens his tentacles, using two of them to fend off 
> > Katya's weapons fire - as if another shot to the head could have 
> made 
> > him any loopier.  He uses one scimitar to parry and tie up the 
> > halberd and swings his other around to hopefully dig into 
> Blackfang's 
> > side.  His eyes glow and unleash a blast at his new attacker from 
> > point-blank range.
